long_description: McNett Zip Tech(TM) zipper lubricant protects all types of watertight and airtight zippers against rust, corrosion, chlorine and salt. Lubricates and protects the zippers on dry suits, survival suits, environmental suits, dry bags and more. Specially formulated to repel dirt, sand and organic residue, inhibit rust and resist corrosion. Provides UV protection for nylon and plastic zippers. Zip Tech won't break down the rubber or adhesive in zipper skirts (the part of the zipper to the sides of the teeth), and Zip Tech won't flake or jam in extreme temperatures. Convenient roll-on applicator. Nontoxic, biodegradeable McNett Zip Tech zipper lubricant contains no silicone or paraffin.
short_description: McNett Zip Tech(TM) zipper lubricant protects all types of watertight and airtight zippers against rust, corrosion, chlorine and salt.
